inputs.name: token
inputs.description: ERC20 token which is being vested

abiDocs.name: releasableAmount
abiDocs.details: Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: ERC20 token which is being vested

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: ERC20 token which is being vested

abiDocs.name: vestedAmount
abiDocs.details: Calculates the amount that has already vested.

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: ERC20 token which is being vested

abiDocs.name: revoke
abiDocs.notice: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
